rules_text:
When Enchanted Trinket enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from the chosen color. [i](This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with that color.)[/i]
Equip {2}
[i]Bloodbond[/i] – {4}{W}{B}, Sacrifice equipped creature: Destroy target permanent of the chosen color.
